topic.title: Rep and Set System Chance
topic.shortdesc:
I wanted to think more of the sets and reps as actual objects and so I tried my best to implement it as so.
Implemented some changes into the higher level classes.
2024 - 10 - 24

body.p: Sets have a private array of Rep objects and are initialized with a # of reps and a weight. Exercise.java was modified as to reflect the changes in the rep and sets system. I much prefer this system of systems of objects rather than the 2D arrays I previously had.

In the initializeExercise method of Wendell531.java, I changed the methods called with the exercise object into only just initializeSet. I feel that this better aligns with how intuitive the new reps and sets system is.
